content.question: If a banking system has ample reserves, which of the following is an action taken by the central bank that would cause a decrease in the cyclical rate of unemployment in the short run?

choices.label: An increase in the required reserve ratio
An increase in the policy rate
An increase in the discount rate
A decrease in interest on reserves
A decrease in personal income tax rates

content.answer: A decrease in interest on reserves
